v.v: God has made the people in Judah to know him;
In Jerusalem is where he resides;
There he broke the flaming arrows that his enemies shot,
God, you are powerful! You are like a great king
Their brave soldiers were killed, and then those who killed them took away everything that those soldiers had.
When you, the God whom Jacob worshiped, rebuked your enemies,
Truly, you cause everyone to be afraid.
From heaven you proclaimed that you would judge people,
when you arose to declare that you would punish wicked people
When you punish those with whom you are angry, your people will praise you,
So give to Yahweh the offerings that you promised to give to him;

v: and he also broke their shields and swords and other weapons that they used in battles.
as you return from the mountains where you defeated your enemies.
indeed, none of them were able to fight any longer.
their horses and their riders fell down dead.
When you are angry and you punish people, no one can endure it.
and then everyone on the earth was afraid and did not say anything more
and rescue all those whom they had oppressed.
and your enemies who survive will worship you on your festival days.
all the people of nearby people groups should also bring gifts to him, the one who is awesome.
